description: Mini-test and mock exam templates for ACCA FM (Financial Management) covering all syllabus areas

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 1 – Introduction & Foundations
notes_for_agent: Focus on role of financial manager and environment
Cover stakeholder objectives and financial markets
Include ethics and corporate governance basics

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 2 – Time Value of Money
notes_for_agent: Cover present and future value calculations
Include annuities and perpetuities
Test EAR and bond valuation

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 3 – Cost of Capital
notes_for_agent: Focus on CAPM and beta calculations
Cover cost of equity and cost of debt
Include WACC calculations and capital structure theories

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 4 – Risk & Return
notes_for_agent: Test business and financial risk concepts
Cover portfolio theory and diversification
Include Security Market Line applications

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 5 – Investment Appraisal
notes_for_agent: Heavy focus on NPV and IRR calculations
Include payback, ARR, and MIRR methods
Cover capital rationing, sensitivity, and scenario analysis
Test taxation and inflation adjustments

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 6 – Working Capital Management
notes_for_agent: Focus on inventory management (EOQ, JIT)
Cover receivables management and credit policies
Include cash management and working capital financing

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 7 – Financing & Distributions
notes_for_agent: Cover sources of equity and debt finance
Include convertibles, warrants, and hybrid instruments
Test dividend policy theories and distributions

mini_tests.title: FM Mini Test 8 – FX, Interest & Risk Management
notes_for_agent: Focus on foreign exchange risk hedging (forward, futures, options)
Cover interest rate risk management
Include derivatives and financial risk management strategies
